title: Video Assistant
name: videoassistant
description: Play embedded videos in external player
author: Ed Williams

preferences.name: uriExtensions
preferences.title: Video types
preferences.description: Comma separated list of file extensions to open

preferences.name: closeTab
preferences.title: Close tab
preferences.description: Automatically close tab when media player starts

preferences.name: cancelDefault
preferences.title: Stop browser playing
preferences.description: Stop the browser playing the video

preferences.name: enableYoutube
preferences.title: Enable Youtube
preferences.description: Open Youtube videos (player must support Youtube urls e.g. mpv)

preferences.name: enableDomainBlacklist
preferences.title: Enable blacklist
preferences.description: Ignore video requests on these domains
